channel.title: Just Wondering
channel.description:
I got my VPS running (thank god)
And I'm kind of scared that when my one month is over, that my source folder with all the up-to-date characters will disappear once the one month is over (in case I may be out of town or unaware of the subscription ending), is this possible? Or do you get time to retrieve your files.
I know its kind of a stupid question, just don't want to have a 1-month-old source file once the vps is over.

item.title: Just Wondering
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Here is an idea, back up your files?

You should do that regardless anyway, what if the hard drive fails?

Read full topic

item.title: Just Wondering
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

Just when its around the end of the month, go on the vps and upload the character files to like uppit.
